name: Color Spree
description:
Game made during Jame Gam 2021. (Theme: Four Colors, Object to use: Gun)

STORY / PROLOGUE

THE SIEGE FROM THE CARPE DIMENSION HAS BEEN GOING FOR YEARS NOW.

YOU, the god of light, the blesser of kolor from the ULTRA-FUTURE has the one purpose to save the peaceful worldly inhabitants from the carpe demons.

The goal of the demons is to bring the Pallete o' Ikhe'ah , the dark gray, to the world.

In doing so the Carpe demons will devour it whole.

save us o great Kulör!!!
